## ModelRegistry.getDepth() method

Retrieves the Z-axis depth of a model for a scale of 1.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDepth(modelUri: string): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

modelUri


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The URI of the model to retrieve the depth for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The depth of the model.
